traits.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The coral smasher has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The coral smasher can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

traits.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The coral smasher can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

traits.name: Siege Monster
entries: The coral smasher deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The coral smasher makes two attacks with its warhammer, or one attack with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Warhammer
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) slashing damage.
